headline: 2 Stocks Down 27% and 8% to Buy Right Now
summary: In fact, two software stocks, Adobe (NASDAQ: ADBE) and PTC (NASDAQ: PTC) have headed in the other direction.  During the same time period, Adobe and PTC have fallen about 27% and 8%, respectively.  Scott Levine (Adobe): With enthusiasm for artificial intelligence (AI) running rampant, it certainly doesn't feel like there have been a lot of opportunities recently to scoop up leading AI stocks at a discount.
